Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates a ship

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship()
      Sets angle status and length to zero by default.

      • setColsOrRows

        public void setColsOrRows(int num)
        Gets the length of the ship and sets number of columns and rows of the ship according to angle status
        Parameters:
        num - Is the length for the ship given by the user, can be from {2,3,4,5}

      • shipStartPlace

        public void shipStartPlace(int x,
                           int y)
        Sets the start place of the ship (Far left coordinates for horizontal ship | Far above for the vertical ship)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the start place
        y - y coordinate of the start place
